text: Sredi lyudey vstrechayetsya i takoy, kotoryy stoit na grani [mezhdu veroy i neveriyem] v Allakha: yesli yemu dostayetsya v udel dobro, on utverzhdayetsya [v vere], yesli zhe yego porazhayet bedstviye, on sklonyayetsya [k neveriyu], teryaya [dolyu] kak v etoy, tak i v budushchey zhizni. Eto i yest' yavnyy ubytok
